How many calories are in a small order of onion rings from the fast food restaurant, Everest?
In: Health › Diet&Nutrition
Rate This Answer
I'm not finding anything on line about the nutritional values of a small order of onion rings from Everest but I can estimate, by using CalorieKing, that they would be between 300 and 350 calories and about 17 grams of fat. ChaCha Answered
